name: Pyramid Rush (itch)
description:
During the quarantine I began the development of my new game called "Pyramid Rush"Finally I finished the demo and looking forward for any criticism, tips and feedback. I would really like to know if you like graphics and animation, wether the movement feels good and what is your general impression

This game is planned to be a mix of platformer and puzzle genre divided into 3 chapter, each with its own unique levels and boss.

Here is the video of full walkthrough

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vi_brHPYVVo&feature=youtu.be

And here is game's website, where I post devlog, roadmap and other interesting news about game's development:

http://nesterio.com/

Thank you!
